3: There are more humans on this side of Oasis. You don't have to tiptoe around here.
Look at you. Why are you even here getting stressed out like that?
That's right! About to grab some food and have a rest!
That's a friend of mine defecting to our side. We met on the battlefield before.
Did the Babylonians leave you behind as well?
But now that you're here, you don't have to worry anymore! Mr. Watanabe won't let anyone hurt you like that!
Cough—my friend here is still quite traumatized, so don't expect, erm, you know...
Ah! I'm so sorry—that must have been too much information for you to process! Please, rest up! I should go eat something as well.
I was just trying to find an excuse. I wasn't trying to make you the buff of a joke.
Sure, things are tattered and beat-up here in Oasis, and our infrastructure is lacking...
But the people... It feels like home, isn't it?
